## Installing and loading the package
The package is currently on Github and not on CRAN, so you will need to download it from Github using the `{devtools}` package

```{r setup}
# install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("uashogeschoolutrecht/artefacts")
library(artefacts)
```

## Data package `{artefacts}`
The `{artefacts}` package is an R package containing data anad scripts from a biomonitoring experiment in young human volunteers.....
